name: CentroidHom.star_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring α
inst✝ : StarRing α
f : CentroidHom α
a : α
⊢ Eq ((Star.star f) a) (Star.star (f (Star.star a)))
decl: @[simp] lemma star_apply (f : CentroidHom α) (a : α) : (star f) a = star (f (star a)) := rfl

name: CentroidHom.star_centerToCentroidCenter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring α
inst✝ : StarRing α
z : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α) x
⊢ Eq (Star.star (CentroidHom.centerToCentroidCenter z)) (CentroidHom.centerToCentroidCenter (Star.star z))
decl:
theorem star_centerToCentroidCenter (z : NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α) :
    star (centerToCentroidCenter z) =
      (centerToCentroidCenter (star z : NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α)) := by
  ext a
  calc
      (star (centerToCentroidCenter z)) a = star (z * star a) := rfl
      _ = star (star a) * star z := by simp only [star_mul, star_star, StarMemClass.coe_star]
      _ = a * star z := by rw [star_star]
      _ = (star z) * a := by rw [(star z).property.comm]
      _ = (centerToCentroidCenter ((star z) : NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α)) a := rfl

name: CentroidHom.starCenterToCentroid_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring α
inst✝ : StarRing α
z : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α) x
a : α
⊢ Eq ((CentroidHom.starCenterToCentroid z) a) (HMul.hMul (↑z) a)
decl:
lemma starCenterToCentroid_apply (z : NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α) (a : α) :
    (starCenterToCentroid z) a = z * a := rfl

name: CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NonAssocSemiring α
inst✝ : StarRing α
a : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α) x
⊢ Eq (CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid a) (CentroidHom.starCenterToCentroid a)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma starCenterIsoCentroid_apply (a : ↥(NonUnitalStarSubsemiring.center α)) :
    CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid a = CentroidHom.starCenterToCentroid a := rfl

name: CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid_symm_apply_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NonAssocSemiring α
inst✝ : StarRing α
T : CentroidHom α
⊢ Eq (↑(CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid.symm T)) (T 1)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma starCenterIsoCentroid_symm_apply_coe (T : CentroidHom α) :
    ↑(CentroidHom.starCenterIsoCentroid.symm T) = T 1 := rfl
